Verses: 1 ushnakaalaththile Uraindhapaniyum, Aruppukkaalaththile Mazhaiyum Thagaadhadhupola, Moodanukku Magimai Thagaadhu.
2 adaikkalaan Kuruvi Alaindhupovadhupolum, Thagaivilaan Kuruvi Parandhupovadhupolum, Kaaranamillaamal Itta Saabam Thangaadhu.
3 kudhiraikku Savukkum, Kazhudhaikkuk Kadivaalamum, Moodanudaiya Mudhugukkup Pirambum Etradhu.
4 moodanukku Avan Madhiyeenaththinpadi Maruuththaravu Kodaadhe; Koduththaal Neeyum Avanaip Polaavaai.
5 moodanukku Avan Madhiyeenaththinpadi Maruuththaravu Kodu; Kodaavittaal Avan Than Paarvaikku Gnaaniyaayiruppaan.
6 moodan Kaiyile Seydhi Anuppugiravan Than Kaalgalaiye Thariththukkondu Nashtaththai Adaigiraan.
7 nondiyin Kaalgal Kundhikkundhi Nadakkum, Appadiye Moodarin Vaayilulla Uvamaichsollum Kundhum.
8 moodanukku Ganaththaik Kodukkiravan Kavanile Kallaikkattugiravan Poliruppaan.
9 moodan Vaayil Agappatta Pazhamozhi Veriyan Kaiyil Agappatta Mullu.
10 belaththavan Anaivaraiyum Nogappanni, Moodanaiyum Velaikollugiraan, Meeri Nadakkiravargalaiyum Velaikollugiraan.
11 naayaanadhu Thaan Kakkinadhaith Thinnumpadi Thirumbuvadhupola, Moodanum Than Moodaththanaththukkuth Thirumbugiraan.
12 than Paarvaikku Gnaaniyaayiruppavanaik Kandaayaanaal, Avanaippaarkkilum Moodanaikkuriththu Adhiga Nambikkaiyaayirukkalaam.
13 vazhiyile Singam Irukkum, Nadu Veedhiyile Singam Irukkum Endru Somberi Solluvaan.
14 kadhavu Keelmoolaiyil Aadugiradhupola, Somberiyum Padukkaiyil Aadikkondirukkiraan.
15 somberi Than Kaiyaik Kalaththile Vaiththu Adhaith Than Vaaikkuth Thirumba Edukka Varuththappadugiraan.
16 buththiyulla Maruuththaravu Sollaththagum Ezhuperaippaarkkilum Somberi Than Paarvaikku Adhiga Gnaanamullavan.
17 vazhiye Pogaiyil Thanakkadaadha Vazhakkil Thalaiyidugiravan Naayaik Kaadhaip Pidiththizhukkiravanaippolirukkiraan.
18 kolligalaiyum Ambugalaiyum Saavukkedhuvaanavaigalaiyum Erigira Paiththiyakkaaran Eppadiyirukkiraano,
19 appadiye, Thanakkaduththavanai Vanjiththu: Naan Vilaiyaattukkallavo Seydhen Endru Sollugira Manushanum Irukkiraan.
20 viragillaamal Neruppu Aviyum; Kolsollugiravanillaamal Sandai Adangum.
21 karigal Thazhalukkum, Viragu Neruppukkum Edhuvaanadhupola, Vaadhuppiriyan Sandaigalai Moottugiradharku Edhuvaanavan.
22 kolkaaranudaiya Vaarththaigal Vilaiyaattuppolirukkum; Aanaalum Avaigal Ullaththirkul Thaikkum.
23 nesa Analaik Kaanbikkira Udhadugalodu Koodiya Theeyanenjam Vellippoochchu Poosiya Ottaippolirukkum.
24 pagaignan Than Ullaththil Kabadaththai Maraiththu, Than Udhadugalinaal Soodhupesugiraan.
25 avan Idhampesinaalum Avanai Nambaadhe; Avan Irudhayaththil Ezhu Aruvaruppugal Undu.
26 pagaiyai Vanjagamaai Maraiththuvaikkiravanevano, Avanudaiya Pollaangu Magaa Sabaiyile Velippaduththappadum.
27 padukuzhiyai Vettugiravan Thaane Adhil Vizhuvaan; Kallaip Purattugiravanmel Andhak Kal Thirumba Vizhum.
28 kallanaavu Thannaal Kilesappattavargalaip Pagaikkum; Ichchagampesum Vaai Azhivai Undupannum.
